About

I'm Dan. I live in Chicago, ride bikes, make things from fabric and put things on maps. I work for the Delta Institute in Chicago.

This space is part experiment, documentation, memory aid, and sounding board. Development is ongoing and you can follow along or submit an issue on GitHub.

Tech Specs

Because whether it's computers, bicycles, craft beer or home appliances, everybody loves specs.

  • Built with Jekyll, because static pages are great
  • Theme is Poole with a few minor style modifications
  • Hosting is by Github Pages
  • See my post here for more details

Want to talk?

If you're looking for info on Maptime Chicago, try contacting me through one of the above channels or the super official MaptimeCHI Twitter account.
